text: When the wall had been rebuilt and I had positioned the doors, and the gatekeepers, the singers, and the Levites had been appointed,

I then <st data-num="06680" class="">put in charge</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="1" /> my <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="02607" class="">Hanani</st> and <st data-num="02608" class="">Hananiah</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="08269" class="">chief</st> of the <st data-num="01002" class="">citadel</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> was a <st data-num="0571" class="">faithful</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> and <st data-num="03372" class="">feared</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> more than <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st> do.

I<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to them, “The <st data-num="08179" class="">gates</st> of <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st> must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="06605" class="">opened</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="02527" class="">early</st> <st data-num="08121" class="">morning</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">those</st> who are <st data-num="05975" class="">standing guard</st> <st data-num="01479" class="">close</st> the <st data-num="01817" class="">doors</st> and <st data-num="0270" class="">lock</st> them.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="05975" class="">Position</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">residents</st> of <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st> as <st data-num="04931" class="">guards</st>, <st data-num="0376" class="">some</st> at their <st data-num="04929" class="">guard stations</st> and <st data-num="0376" class="">some</st> <st data-num="05048" class="">near</st> their <st data-num="01004" class="">homes</st>.”

Now the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> was <st data-num="07342 03027">spread out</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="01419" class="">large</st>, and there were <st data-num="04592" class="">not a lot</st> of <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> in <st data-num="08432" class="">it</st>.<n id="2" /> At that time <st data-num="01004" class="">houses</st> had <st data-num="0369">not been</st> <st data-num="01129" class="">rebuilt</st>.

My God placed it on my heart to gather the leaders, the officials, and the ordinary people so they could be enrolled on the basis of genealogy. I found the genealogical records of those who had formerly returned. Here is what I found written in that record:

These are the people of the province who returned from the captivity of the exiles, whom King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon had forced into exile. They returned to Jerusalem and to Judah, each to his own city.

They came with Zerubbabel, Jeshua, Nehemiah, Azariah, Raamiah, Nahamani, Mordecai, Bilshan, Mispereth, Bigvai, Nehum, and Baanah.

The number of Israelite men was as follows:
the descendants of Parosh: 2,172;
the descendants of Shephatiah: 372;
the descendants of Arah: 652;
the descendants of Pahath Moab (from the line of Jeshua and Joab): 2,818;
the descendants of Elam: 1,254;
the descendants of Zattu: 845;
the descendants of Zaccai: 760;
the descendants of Binnui: 648;
the descendants of Bebai: 628;
the descendants of Azgad: 2,322;
the descendants of Adonikam: 667;
the descendants of Bigvai: 2,067;
the descendants of Adin: 655;
the descendants of Ater (through Hezekiah): 98;
the descendants of Hashum: 328;
the descendants of Bezai: 324;
the descendants of Harif: 112;
the descendants of Gibeon: 95;
The men of Bethlehem and Netophah: 188;
the men of Anathoth: 128;
the men of the family of Azmaveth: 42;
the men of Kiriath Jearim, Kephirah, and Beeroth: 743;
the men of Ramah and Geba: 621;
the men of Micmash: 122;
the men of Bethel and Ai: 123;
the men of the other Nebo: 52;
the descendants of the other Elam: 1,254;
the descendants of Harim: 320;
the descendants of Jericho: 345;
the descendants of Lod, Hadid, and Ono: 721;
the descendants of Senaah: 3,930;
The priests: the descendants of Jedaiah (through the family of Jeshua): 973;
the descendants of Immer: 1,052;
the descendants of Pashhur: 1,247;
the descendants of Harim: 1,017.
The Levites: the descendants of Jeshua (through Kadmiel, through the line of Hodaviah): 74.
The singers: the descendants of Asaph: 148.
The gatekeepers: the descendants of Shallum, the descendants of Ater, the descendants of Talmon, the descendants of Akkub, the descendants of Hatita, and the descendants of Shobai: 138.
The temple servants: the descendants of Ziha, the descendants of Hasupha, the descendants of Tabbaoth,

the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="07026" class="">Keros</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="05517" class="">Sia</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="06303" class="">Padon</st>,

the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="03838" class="">Lebanah</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="02286" class="">Hagabah</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="08014" class="">Shalmai</st>,

the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="02605" class="">Hanan</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="01435" class="">Giddel</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="01515" class="">Gahar</st>,

the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="07211" class="">Reaiah</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="07526" class="">Rezin</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="05353" class="">Nekoda</st>,

the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="01502" class="">Gazzam</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="05798" class="">Uzzah</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="06454" class="">Paseah</st>,

the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="01153" class="">Besai</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="04586" class="">Meunim</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="05300" class="">Nephussim</st>,

the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="01227" class="">Bakbuk</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="02709" class="">Hakupha</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="02744" class="">Harhur</st>,

the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="01213" class="">Bazluth</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="04240" class="">Mehida</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="02797" class="">Harsha</st>,

the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="01302" class="">Barkos</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="05516" class="">Sisera</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="08547" class="">Temah</st>,
the descendants of Neziah, the descendants of Hatipha.
The descendants of the servants of Solomon: the descendants of Sotai, the descendants of Sophereth, the descendants of Perida,

the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="03279" class="">Jaala</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="01874" class="">Darkon</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="01435" class="">Giddel</st>,
the descendants of Shephatiah, the descendants of Hattil, the descendants of Pokereth Hazzebaim, and the descendants of Amon.
All the temple servants and the descendants of the servants of Solomon, 392.

These are the ones who came up from Tel Melah, Tel Harsha, Kerub, Addon, and Immer (although they were unable to certify their family connection or their ancestry, as to whether they were really from Israel):
the descendants of Delaiah, the descendants of Tobiah, and the descendants of Nekoda, 642.

And from among the priests: the descendants of Hobaiah, the descendants of Hakkoz, and the descendants of Barzillai (who had married a woman from the daughters of Barzillai the Gileadite and was called by that name).

<st data-num="0428" class="">They</st> <st data-num="01245" class="">searched</st> for their <st data-num="03791" class="">records</st> in the <st data-num="03187" class="">genealogical materials</st>, but <st data-num="03808" class="">none</st> were <st data-num="04672" class="">found</st>. They were therefore <st data-num="01351" class="">excluded</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="03550" class="">priesthood</st>.
The governor instructed them not to eat any of the sacred food until there was a priest who could consult the Urim and Thummim.
The entire group numbered 42,360—

<st data-num="0905" class="">not counting</st> their <st data-num="0428 07651 0505 07969 03967 07970 07651">7,337</st> <st data-num="05650" class="">male</st> and <st data-num="0519" class="">female</st> <st data-num="05650 0519">servants</st>. They also had <st data-num="03967 0705 02568">245</st> <st data-num="07891" class="">male</st> and <st data-num="07891" class="">female singers</st>.
They had <st data-num="07651 03967 07970 08337">736</st> <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st>, <st data-num="03967 0705 02568">245</st> <st data-num="06505" class="">mules</st>,

<st data-num="07117" class="">Some</st> of the <st data-num="01" class="">family</st> <st data-num="07218" class="">leaders</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05414" class="">contributed</st> to the <st data-num="04399" class="">work</st>. The <st data-num="08660" class="">governor</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">contributed</st> to the <st data-num="0214" class="">treasury</st> <st data-num="0505" class="">1,000</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="01871" class="">drachmas</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="02572" class="">50</st> <st data-num="04219" class="">bowls</st>, and <st data-num="07970 02568 03967">530</st> <st data-num="03548" class="">priestly</st> <st data-num="03801" class="">garments</st>.

Some of the <st data-num="01" class="">family</st> <st data-num="07218" class="">leaders</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> to the <st data-num="04399" class="">project</st> <st data-num="0214" class="">treasury</st> <st data-num="08147 07239">20,000</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="01871" class="">drachmas</st> and <st data-num="0505 03967">2,200</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="04488" class="">minas</st>.
What the rest of the people gave amounted to 20,000 gold drachmas, 2,000 silver minas, and 67 priestly garments.

The priests, the Levites, the gatekeepers, the singers, some of the people, the temple servants, and all the rest of Israel lived in their cities.

When the seventh month arrived and the Israelites were settled in their towns,
